title: Paintmailer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose two people at night to Paintmail.
- Choose one person at night to Paintmail. This Rampages.
- Choose one person at night to Paintmail. You will also Paintmail whoever they visit.
- Spread Paintmail like the plague. Anyone who is Paintmailed will spread the Paintmail effect to whoever they visit and whoever visits them. You may be Paintmailed this way. (1 Use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Anyone who is Paintmailed is disabled from speaking for one day. Instead, they must communicate by posting images they draw in MS paint or a similar application. These images may contain at most a single letter.
- Paintmailing lasts permanently, even if it doesn't have the muting effect. Paintmail may be reapplied to mute someone again.
- You may never multitask.
- Roleblock and Prevention Immune.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see at least all other players be Paintmailed at least once.
